img_text: WHEN A WOMAN SAYS, "THIS MAN RAPED ME A LONG TIME AGO, WE SAY, "BUT THAT WAS IN THE PAST WHEN A GIRL SAYS,"THIS BOY RAPED ME LAST NIGHT," WE SAY, "BUT WE CAN'T WRECK HIS FUTURE!" AND THERE SHE STANDS, SUSPENDED BETWEEN HIS PAST AND HIS FUTURE, WITH NO VALUE OF HER OWN 19 @SimchaFisher on Twitter
